data.author: Judith Martin, Nicholas Ivor Martin and Jacobina Martin
data.description: They wreak havoc, and their parents do nothing about it.
data.title: Miss Manners: She insists on bringing her rude kids to adults-only events. What can we do?

data.author: Odisha Diary bureau
data.description: New Delhi : The Centre has written to all States and Union Territories to create awareness on prevention of cervical cancer and the importance of HPV vaccine among girl students across the country. In a joint letter by the Union Education Secretary Shri Sanjay Kumar and Union Health Secretary Shri Rajesh Bhushan it has been […]
data.title: Centre urges States to create awareness and take steps for prevention of cervical cancer among girl students

data.description: PUTRAJAYA (Dec 22): A permanent secretariat, led by the Ministry of Domestic Trade and Cost of Living (KPDN) together with the Ministry of Economy, will be established in the near future, to address issues related to people’s cost of living. Domestic Trade and Cost of Living Minister, Datuk Salahuddin Ayub, said that the establishment of [...]
data.title: Salahuddin: Permanent secretariat to be set up to address cost of living issues

data.author: Todd
data.description: POUGHKEEPSIE – Dutchess County Drug Task Force (DCDTF) Detective Sergeant Adam Harris announced that his group has seized another type of counterfeit Oxycodone containing fentanyl in the county.  The seizure was made during an ongoing investigation.  Harris declined to provide additional information on how the pills were seized to protect the integrity of the investigation. […]
data.title: Drug task force seizes new version of counterfeit Oxycodone

data.author: Reuters
data.description: LONDON — Oil prices climbed for a fourth straight day on Thursday with U.S. crude, heating oil and jet fuel stocks growing tighter just as a wintry blast hits the United States. Brent crude futures gained 74 cents, or 0.9%, to trade at $82.94 at 0911 GMT, extending gains of around 2.7% from the previous […]
data.title: Oil rises on tight U.S. stocks as winter blast hits

data.author: Hank Gross
data.description: SAUGERTIES – A 33-year-old Saugerties man has been remanded to the Ulster County Jail in connection with a September 30 residential burglary that occurred on September 30. At that time, the homeowner reported to police that someone had broken into their residence and stole personal belongings, jewelry, paintings, copper pipes and $75,000 in cash. Investigation […]
data.title: Saugerties man charged residential burglary
